thread.title: Florida Judge Recommends Sweeping Changes to State Congressional Map
thread.title_full: Florida Judge Recommends Sweeping Changes to State Congressional Map - WSJ

author: Arian Campo-Flores
title: Florida Judge Recommends Sweeping Changes to State Congressional Map
text:
A Florida judge on Friday recommended sweeping changes to the state’s congressional map that would present some incumbents with tough re-election battles and offer Democrats the possibility of a net gain of one or two seats in the congressional delegation.
The decision marks a decisive turn in a yearslong legal battle over Florida’s congressional map that left many incumbents and candidates facing deep uncertainty a year before the 2016 elections. Now it is up to the Florida Supreme Court, which ordered Circuit Judge Terry...
